Title: Steelers see season end with fifth straight loss
Description: Veteran quarterback Russell Wilson and the Pittsburgh Steelers saw their season end on Saturday night, falling to the Baltimore Ravens, 28-14, in the AFC wild card round at M&T Bank Stadium, the franchise's sixth playoff defeat in eight seasons.
